StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMilestonesData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID as integer, @SchoolYear as integer, @PlanType as varchar(40) AS
SELECT PRIORITY_CODE, OBJECTIVE_MONTH, OBJECTIVE_PERCENTAGE FROM HIGH_SCHOOL_MILESTONE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE PLAN_TYPE = @PlanType AND ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ORDER BY HIGH_SCHOOL_MILESTONE.PRIORITY_CODE, OBJECTIVE_MONTH
